pageDescription: The soundtrack I created for my university final year project!

music.title: Title Theme
music.description: The music that plays on the title screen.

music.title: Story
music.description: The music that plays on the story screen.

music.title: Alone in the Cell
music.description: The music that plays before you leave the beginning cell.

music.title: Music Gun
music.description: The music that plays when the player uses the Music Gun.

music.title: The Wizard
music.description: The music that plays prior to the final battle with the Evil Wizard.

music.title: The Wizard's Brawl
music.description: The music that plays when the player is fighting the Evil Wizard, the final boss.

music.title: Ending
music.description: The music that plays during the ending cutscene.

music.title: Cell (Unused)
music.description: Unused music from the development of the game.

music.title: Dungeon (Unused)
music.description: Unused dungeon music from the development of the game.

music.title: Credits (Unused)
music.description: Unused music for a scrapped credits scene.

music.title: The Evil Wizard (Extended)
music.description: An extended version of the Evil Wizard's theme.

music.title: Trailer
music.description: Music created for a trailer to show off the game at a game exhibition.
